description: For a quick, delicious midweek meal, try this coconut butter chicken recipe that swaps rice for steamed cauliflower rice.
name: 30-Minute Coconut Butter Chicken Curry Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 rspca approved fresh chicken thigh fillets

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, microwave cauliflower rice packets according to packet instructions for 2 1/2 minutes. Divide cauliflower rice among four bowls. Top with curry, season and serve.
